titleStmt.title: The Lords table. Whether it is to be spread like a table in an inne for all comers? That it ought not so be done is here maintained.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Ezekias, 1590-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Henry Cripps in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
